response.answer_text: Experience will beat knowledge every time. What is knowledge and experience ? What is knowledge and wisdom ? Knowing is a mere knowledge, understanding is the true wisdom- Anonymous Experience with understanding is wisdom When you want to meet specialist doctors, you take appointments, pay a hefty consultation fees, this is for experience not for knowledge alone Experience is not what happens to you, it is what you do with what happens to you - Aldous Huxley  Experience, Understand, be wiser
